data.description: vertices, edges, faces of common polyhedra
data.communities: irc, perlmonks, sdl::opengl users, example scripts
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
(This is a repost, please don't flame if it's not in limbo, since 7
    May. My other two were registered quicker, and I've seen others
    registered since 7 May.)

    I chose "Math::Polyhedra" as the most obvious name for searching
    without starting some new and unintuitive deep namespace like
    Math::Geometry::Data::Polyhedra.

    This produces commonly calculated data for use in graphics
    programs. It's designed from a study of 120 points defined from the
    Golden Ratio.
